title: Art, Fear and Faith: Stephanie Lam, Award Winning Artist Talks about the Journey
description:
Award winning artist, Stephanie Lam, shares her life journey and her work as an artist. Along the way, faith intersects with life intersects with art intersects with faith. You'll enjoy her raw honesty and authenticity, and most of all her joy.

http://www.stephanielam.com

Art & Fear: Observations On the Perils (and Rewards) of Artmaking
by Orland and Bayles
Learn more: https://www.amazon.com/dp/0961454733/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_YwxrFbHWM6X6K

The Taste Gap by Ira Glass
https://youtu.be/91FQKciKfHI

Paul Ekman on micro expressions
https://youtu.be/J9i-9_QuetA

Artist Robert Burridge:  This is one of hundreds of his Bob Blast videos on YouTube. Have fun.
https://youtu.be/HWYavceHeUU

The Pet Loss Podcast:
https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/stephanie-lam/the-pet-loss-podcast

High on Paint Fumes Podcast:
https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/stephanie-lam-2/high-on-paint-fumes
